Text:
I can't believe someone uploaded this.

I actually have a brand new copy of this game.

It's a lot of fun.
BTW, this game is now available free.
really? and where would that be? ;)

@Insomneac, I have hunted high and low for this game all over the internet, I did not see it as a free download anywhere hence why I wished to post it here, all I found was a single buggy torrent and people on forums and youtube videos complaining that is was impossible to get ahold of.
You should search for "abandonware". Most of old (and usually good, like this) games can be downloaded from "these" sites.

It's available at a few sites.

Here's one: http://games.brothersoft.com/enemy-infestation.html
That file is only 10mb in size, that one is just a fake.
